nodes.bodyText: Should these initializers should be synchronized? (If so, not initialize itself, to avoid deadlocks).
There haven't been any issues with it as of yet, but that may become an issue in future. Maybe @SJuliez can comment on why it wasn't done that way originally?
I didn't think about it. I think MM uses only few extra threads, for the RATs, boardview refresh and pathfinding. None of these will request an image. So perhaps we are safe now...
